dmca.title: Notice of Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

 

Please visit our web site at  <http://www.theplanet.com/legal>
www.theplanet.com/legal.

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


  _____  

From: Michael Houck [mailto:mhouck@yarmuth.com] 
Sent: Monday, March 27, 2006 5:24 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Notice of Copyright Infringement


This law firm represents DIRECTV in the investigation of and litigation
regarding unauthorized reception of satellite television programming.
Attached is a letter notifying ThePlanet.com of copyright infringement.
Additional copies were sent to your office via Federal Express and
facsimile.
 
Please call Scott Wilsdon at 206-516-3871 to discuss this matter. 
 
 
Michael Houck
Paralegal
Yarmuth Wilsdon Calfo PLLC 
The IDX Tower
925 Fourth Avenue, Suite 2500
Seattle, WA  98104
Telephone:  (206) 516-3892 
Fax:  (206) 516-3888 
E-mail:  mhouck@yarmuth.com 

 
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE:  This e-mail and any attachments may contain
privileged or confidential information generated by Yarmuth Wilsdon Calfo
PLLC or others.  If you are not the intended recipient, please do not read
or review this e-mail or its attachments.  Please also notify the sender of
your receipt of this e-mail and delete all copies of the e-mail and its
attachments from your system.  Thank you.
